ballot_measures.number: 60% Vote Requirement for Ballot Initiatives to Increase or Expand Taxes Amendment
ballot_measures.title: 60% Vote Requirement for Ballot Initiatives to Increase or Expand Taxes Amendment
ballot_measures.description: Require a supermajority requirement of 60% by voters for citizen-initiated ballot measures that create new taxes, increase existing tax rates, or for a property tax. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Utah 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.number: Publication Requirements for Constitutional Amendments Measure
ballot_measures.title: Publication Requirements for Constitutional Amendments Measure
ballot_measures.description: Require that constitutional amendments appearing on the ballot must be published for a period of 60 days. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Utah 2026 ballot.
